results.title: Pathe's animated gazette. No. 346
results.brief_description: This film is made up of the following items: leading Paris fashions; Trafalgar day march; Corporal Bassett, the first New Zealander to win the VC; the destroyed town of Mount St. Eloy; Sir Very Strong visits Bethnal Green military hospital; training recruits in mining and bombing attacks; ammunitions factories; inspection of French artillery; exhibition of German weapons.

results.title: Path to nationhood
results.creator_credit: John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.brief_description: The story of the 1964 elections in Papua and New Guinea, including complation of the Common Roll, the voting, counting and declaration of the polls for the election of the House of Assembly.

results.title: Patal Gange - River of the Gods
results.creator_credit: Jon Weinberger, John Balcomb and UNICEF
results.brief_description: The search for clean water and the education of children and adults of an Indian village ti the perils of contaminated supplies. With the advice and blessing of the village seer and priest, respectively, a UNICEF rig accompanies the drilling of a well to make clean, fresh water available to people in a village.

results.title: Pat Cash tennis my way
results.brief_description: Pat Cash and his coach Ian Barclay look at aspects of the game of tennis. Features special slow motion and still sequences to help study Pat’s technique. Also covers highlights from Grand Slam, Wimbledon and Davis Cup matches.

results.title: Pasturelands of the west: Somersetshire dairy-farming

results.title: Past is prologue: a camera view of a new Norway
results.brief_description: Contrasts the 1100th anniversary of Tonsberg with industry and modern technology. Looks briefly at heavy industry, ship-building, the commissioning of a new oil tanker, and the extent of off-shore drilling. Modern sculpture and space age architecture finish this survey of the new Norway.

results.title: Passiona
results.brief_description: Cathy was a shy, awkward nine year old with a crush on her school teacher, Mr. Wright. Ten years later, as an attractive nineteen year old, Cathy meets him again at her cousin’s birthday party. He develops an interest in her and her memories of him are stirred. Through her romantic childhood eyes, she relives school days. As the night progresses, however, she faces the reality of her teacher and the deceptions wrought by both passion and memory.
